name: Glenoid labrum
text: Glenoid labrum (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: increases glenoid surface area, deepens socket; static stabilizer of the shoulder.

meta.function_raw: Increases surface area, deepens socket, static stabilizer

name: Coracohumeral ligament
text: Coracohumeral ligament (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: restrains inferior translation and external rotation when the arm is adducted.

meta.function_raw: Restrains inferior translation and external rotation of adducted arm

name: Superior glenohumeral ligament
text: Superior glenohumeral ligament (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: restrains external rotation and inferior translation when the arm is adducted or slightly abducted.

meta.function_raw: Restrains external rotation and inferior translation of adducted or slightly abducted arm

name: Middle glenohumeral ligament
text: Middle glenohumeral ligament (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: restrains anterior translation when the arm is abducted to about 45 degrees. Note: absent in up to ~30% of shoulders.

meta.function_raw: Restrains anterior translation with arm abducted to 45 degrees (absent in up to 30% of shoulders)

name: Inferior glenohumeral ligament (anterior band)
text: Inferior glenohumeral ligament, anterior band (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: restrains anterior and inferior translation when the arm is abducted to 90 degrees and externally rotated (position of apprehension).

meta.function_raw: Restrains anterior and inferior translation with arm externally rotated and abducted to 90 degrees (position of apprehension)

name: Inferior glenohumeral ligament (posterior band)
text: Inferior glenohumeral ligament, posterior band (glenohumeral stabilizer). Function: restrains posterior and inferior translation when the arm is abducted to 90 degrees and internally rotated.

meta.function_raw: Restrains posterior and inferior translation with arm internally rotated and abducted to 90 degrees
